snippet: Pharmacy compounding has come under a spotlight in recent months, after a center produced pain medicine contaminated with fungus that caused a national meningitis outbreak.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration commissioner Dr Margaret Hamburg calls on Congress to empower agency to better police compounding pharmacies like one at center of national meningitis outbreak.

byline.contributor: Jess Bidgood contributed reporting from Boston.

lead_paragraph: Pharmacy compounding has come under a spotlight in recent months, after a center produced pain medicine contaminated with fungus that caused a national meningitis outbreak.

headline.seo: F.D.A. Seeks More Control Over Drug Compounders
headline.main: F.D.A. Chief Seeks Expanded Authority to Improve Safety of Drug Compounders
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Chief Seeks Expanded Authority To Improve Safety of Drug Compounders
